imdb.title: Chio-chan no Tsuugakuro
imdb.plot: Chio makes her way to school but encounters abnormal situations resulting in her creating unique solutions.

episodes.title: Because the School Is There/Chio-chan and Hosokawa-san
episodes.plot: Chio-chan happily heads to school after spending the whole night gaming, but her usual route is blocked because of construction.

episodes.title: Bloody Butterfly Effect/Manana, Ootoro, and Me/Bump of Slave
episodes.plot: There are so many dangers on the way to school! Chio-chan is heading to school one day when she sees both Manana and Yuki waiting for her.

episodes.title: Bloody Butterfly Effect 2/The Kabaddic Four
episodes.plot: Chio-chan wakes up earlier than usual and decides to walk through a park to get to school. Later, Chio-chan and Manana have fun talking about the upcoming physical fitness test.

episodes.title: Smoke on the Sailor/Taking the Cherry Blossom in Your Hand/Manana's School Road
episodes.plot: Chio and Manana have interesting conversations, including talking about what kind of situation they'd like to be in before they die, the career survey paths they were given, and how Manana would've dealt with Chio's awkward meeting with Yuki.

episodes.title: Thank You, George/Mananacchio
episodes.plot: One summer day, Chio-chan is faced with the sudden urge to go to the bathroom. Later, Chio discovers that the disciplinary monitor of Samejima Academy's student council, Shinozuka Momo, has feelings for Gotou-sensei.

episodes.title: Everyone's Own Path/Chio-chan Eludes
episodes.plot: Chio-chan is told by Yuki that the head of the Kabaddi Club, Kushitori, is missing. Later, Chio-chan turns her commute into an imaginary route from a video game.

episodes.title: Convenience Store Chio-chan/Chio-chan and the Duel/Remnants of That Day
episodes.plot: Chio-chan heads to her usual convenience store. Later, Chio-chan and Manana run into an old lady who's always sitting alone in front of the café.

episodes.title: Yuki-chan Doesn't Care/Chio Fisher/Momo-chan's Story
episodes.plot: Chio-chan and Manana head to school with their popular friend, Yuki. Later, Chio-chan tries to tell Manana about an exciting new game, and Momo thinks back on how she became a member of the disciplinary committee.

episodes.title: Chio-chan Changes Her Image/Flat Cut
episodes.plot: Tests are an unavoidable part of a student's life. Later, Chio-chan spots a water pipe and starts talking about it as if it were her ideal boyfriend, which makes Manana laugh.

episodes.title: Shinozuka-san, Sugar Content, and the Press Conference/Thousand Spring/Andou and George
episodes.plot: One day, Momo asks Chio-chan and Manana if they'd eat some sweets with her. Later, Chio-chan is walking to school by herself when she spots the little girl she had a duel with before, while Andou and George have a little adventure.

episodes.title: Chio in the Middle of the Night/Apocri!
episodes.plot: Chio-chan is busy gaming into the middle of the night again. Later, Manana gets curious about whether she has body odor after watching a news program on TV, so she has Chio-chan smell her.

episodes.title: Just One Masterful Method/Yuki-chan Bares It All
episodes.plot: One day, Andou's little sister Chiharu ends up visiting Chio at her house. Also, Yuki-chan does some outlandish things at times, but the girls find out she actually spends most of her time naked at home.
